definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Yesterday, protesters smashed cars carrying the prime minister and his aides.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，示威者捣破载着总理及其助理的汽车。

sentences.english: "No to corruption," they say. "No to dictatorship."
sentences.chinese: 示威者提出“不要贪污，不要专政”。

sentences.english: An anti-nuclear demonstrator protest in Parliament Square in London March 14, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 英国伦敦国会广场前抗议的反核示威者。

sentences.english: The Syrian government launched a violent campaign against pro-democracy protesters in March.
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚政府三月份对主张民主的示威者展开暴力镇压。

sentences.english: A group of people were expressing their support for the Palestinian people.
sentences.chinese: 一群示威者亮出了支持巴勒斯坦的旗号。

sentences.english: Two downtown Portland parks where Occupy Portland demonstrators camped for weeks are clear Monday and police say crews will be removing debris and assessing damage.
sentences.chinese: 波特兰两个示威者宿营的城市公园在周一得到了清理。

sentences.english: The protesters are just reminding those in power to look down.
sentences.chinese: 示威者就是在提醒那些当权者往下看。

sentences.english: Vigue said another 5,000 demonstrators were packed inside the building itself.
sentences.chinese: 同时，维格还说另外5000名示威者会在建筑里面。

sentences.english: Bakiyev has denied ordering troops to fire on protesters.
sentences.chinese: 巴基耶夫已否认命令军队向示威者开火。

sentences.english: The police threw the demonstrators into the paddy wagon.
sentences.chinese: 警察将示威者扔进囚车中。

sentences.english: Once again, huge numbers packed Tahrir Square.
sentences.chinese: 大量示威者再次涌进了解放广场。

sentences.english: On Saturday Chinese demonstrators gathered at the Japanese Embassy once again.
sentences.chinese: 星期六中国示威者再次在日本大使馆门前聚集。

sentences.english: There were reports of teargas used against protesters.
sentences.chinese: 有报道称对示威者使用了催泪弹。

sentences.english: Activists have threatened to resort next to what they call 'biological weapons.'
sentences.chinese: 示威者一直威胁下一步将使用其所谓的“生物武器”。

sentences.english: Demonstrators also have denounced what they say is systematic oppression and widespread corruption.
sentences.chinese: 示威者谴责也门有组织的压迫和普遍的腐败问题。

sentences.english: Early morning - protesters plan to bang on the doors of delegates’ hotels
sentences.chinese: 一大早，示威者们计划猛敲代表们就住的酒店的门。

definition: terrorist attack (abbr. for 恐怖襲擊|恐怖袭击[kong3 bu4 xi2 ji1])
